data.text:
@neilbosworth @shaunviljoen @lylenutt 

Divorce Orders do not get sorted into Fast Track but the capturers are changing it to Divorce Orders. The system still have document types in the drop down so that the capturers can correct the record if the doctype was incorrect.

The is currently 50 Divorce orders in Fast Track.
From my investigation, the records are imported as Maintenance Orders and changed to Divorce Orders by the Capturers.
